short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Task list saver with local storage. That keep your tasks organized and easy to manage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clean Task help you keep your tasks organized and easy to manage. This lightweight Chrome extension lets you add, track, and remove tasks effortlessly. Simply enter your tasks, and Clean Task will store them locally for you. Double-click to delete tasks, and enjoy a clean, clutter-free list that always keeps you on track.

Features:
Add tasks with one click or by pressing Enter.
Stores tasks locally using Chrome's storage, so your list stays with you.
Double-click to remove completed tasks.
Stay organized and productive with Clean Task!
